column4: Did you get that message from totem (the default media player)?
yes
what do you suggest?
Did you right-click the file and choose open with VLC?
well, I just did and it doesnt do anything... just when you press play it blinks and return to normal position
you are sure the file is not corrupt?
yup... I copied into a windows comp and it worked
hateball, just if it help to troubleshoot IM using ubuntu hardy 8.04... Im using 2 laptopts with ubuntu and both same problem with some audio files... not corrupted files IM SURE
Are you familiar with the terminal? Could you run "file" on it? "file file.asf"
never heard of that program.... let me try
the file command identifies what filetype it is (if it knows about it)
MICROSOFT ASF
ah, I had hoped it would also show what encoding it was :/
no it only says MICROSOFT ASF thats all....
I hope you are still there
I am.
If it's an asf-container it should have the extention .asf or possibly .wma if it is windows media audio.
mmm I sent you hateball  and geirha the file so you can see
hm, just says "stalled" on me. Not sure what is wrong.
you want me to send it agian?
We can see if hateball can figure out how to play it first :)
hahha okay thanks!
